1407360.name: Siege Survival: Gloria Victis Soundtrack
1407360.description:
Siege Survival: Gloria Victis Soundtrack includes 15 tracks composed and performed by Marcin Przybyłowicz and Magdalena Urbańska:

01. Siege Survival - Survive the Siege
02. Siege Survival - Remnants of the Past
03. Siege Survival - Glimpse of Faith
04. Siege Survival - Another Day
05. Siege Survival - For the Fallen
06. Siege Survival - Dream of the Future Days
07. Siege Survival - Empty Streets
08. Siege Survival - Shades and Whispers
09. Siege Survival - Distant Lights
10. Siege Survival - Moonlight
11. Siege Survival - Before the Storm
12. Siege Survival - Who's There?
13. Siege Survival - These Walls Can't Fall
14. Siege Survival - Here They Come
15. Siege Survival - The Last Stand
